alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 12:00PM EDT until May 11 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near McAllister affecting Menominee and Marinette Counties. Menominee River near Florence affecting Florence, Iron and Dickinson Counties. For the Menominee River...including Florence, McAllister...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Menominee River near Florence. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, flooding is confined to lowland and wooded land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.7 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage by Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
